subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Manning, who had never previously committed a personal foul in the N.F.L., confronted D.J. Swearinger in a preseason game last week after Swearinger hit the Broncos’ Wes Welker in the head.
snippet: Manning, who had never previously committed a personal foul in the N.F.L., confronted D.J. Swearinger in a preseason game last week after Swearinger hit the Broncos’ Wes Welker in the head.
